testimonials.text: Deepak has worked under me for quite a few months and to say his dedication level is always high completes the task taken diligently and would highly reccomend him.

Deepak must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
